term: two ways to overturn court decision
content:
1. another decision thru supreme court
	bad for slavery cuz court just ruled it legal, so need to get new judges
	to get new judges you need new president
		ALL IN ALL THIS IS LONG TERM SOLUTION
2. make an amendment
	amendment not probable cuz 3/4 states not going to vote it thru!!
		SOUTH NEVER GOING TO BE ON BOARD
